Instructions for use

Send an Alert:
• Tap the Emergency Button
• A dialog box will appear asking, 'Are you sure you want to send an alert?'
• Confirm or Cancel:
 • Tap 'Confirm' to send the alert.
 • Tap 'Cancel' to go back and not send the alert.

Managing Emergency Contacts:
• Access Emergency Contacts: Tap the small gear icon near the Panic Button to open the emergency contacts menu.
• Modify Contacts:
 • Add Contact: Enter the details of a new emergency contact (name, phone number, relationship).
 • Edit Contact: Select an existing contact to update their information.
 • Remove Contact: Delete any contact from the list.
• Save Changes: Ensure all changes are saved before closing the emergency contacts menu.

Use Wisely: Only use the Panic Button in actual emergency situations.

Check Contacts Regularly: Ensure your emergency contacts are up to date.

Confirmation: The confirmation dialog helps prevent accidental alerts.
